homes_hear_details: Washington has launched its HOMES and HEAR rebate programs under the Inflation Reduction Act. The Washington State Department of Commerce is administering the programs, building on existing utility efficiency programs and the state's strong commitment to clean energy under the Clean Energy Transformation Act.
state_energy_office: Washington State Department of Commerce - State Energy Office

income_thresholds.low_income_80_ami: For Washington, 80% of Area Median Income varies by county. In King County (Seattle), 80% AMI for a family of four is approximately $89,600. In Spokane County, it is approximately $61,200.
income_thresholds.moderate_income_150_ami: For Washington, 150% of Area Median Income varies by county. In King County (Seattle), 150% AMI for a family of four is approximately $168,000. In Spokane County, it is approximately $114,800.

net_metering: Washington has net metering for systems up to 100 kW under state law (RCW 80.60). Customers receive credit at the retail rate for excess generation. Credits carry forward monthly, with an annual true-up in April where excess credits are granted to the utility. Washington does not have a state sales tax on solar installations (tax exemption for solar energy systems).

state_tax_credits.name: Washington State Sales Tax Exemption for Solar Energy Systems
state_tax_credits.amount: 100% exemption from the state's 6.5% sales tax (plus applicable local sales tax) on solar energy systems
state_tax_credits.eligible_items: Solar photovoltaic systems, solar thermal systems, and associated equipment
state_tax_credits.details: Washington exempts solar energy systems from the state and local sales and use tax, significantly reducing installation costs. This exemption is codified in RCW 82.08.962.

state_rebate_programs.name: Weatherization Assistance Program
state_rebate_programs.amount: Average expenditure of approximately $8,000 per home
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, heating system repair or replacement, windows, doors, health and safety improvements
state_rebate_programs.details: Federally funded program for income-qualifying households at or below 200% of federal poverty level. Administered through local community action agencies across Washington.

state_rebate_programs.name: Washington State Weatherization Plus Health Program
state_rebate_programs.amount: Additional health-related home improvements in conjunction with weatherization
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Healthy home measures including ventilation, moisture control, mold remediation, and asthma-trigger reduction in conjunction with energy efficiency improvements
state_rebate_programs.details: An innovative program that combines weatherization with health-related home improvements to address both energy efficiency and occupant health.

programs.name: PSE Residential Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $2,000 for heat pumps, $1,500 for ductless heat pumps, $600 for insulation, $100 for smart thermostats
programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps (ductless and ducted), insulation, air sealing, smart thermostats, heat pump water heaters, ENERGY STAR windows

programs.name: PSE Home Energy Assessment
programs.amount: Free online or reduced-cost in-home energy assessment
programs.eligible_items: Comprehensive home energy evaluation with recommendations

programs.name: Seattle City Light HomeWise Weatherization
programs.amount: Free weatherization improvements for income-qualifying customers (up to full cost of improvements)
programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, duct sealing, lighting upgrades, and other energy efficiency measures for income-qualifying households

programs.name: Seattle City Light Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $2,000 for heat pumps, $500 for heat pump water heaters, $200 for smart thermostats
programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps, heat pump water heaters, smart thermostats, ENERGY STAR appliances

programs.name: Tacoma Power Residential Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $1,500 for heat pumps, $500 for insulation, $100 for smart thermostats
programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps, insulation, air sealing, duct sealing, heat pump water heaters, smart thermostats
